name: Page Change Tracker
description: Scheduler to track any changes between a particular web page.

CHECK_URL.description: Url which is going to get checked for changes.

CHECK_PAGE_SELECTOR.description: If you want to diff for a particular dom selector only

CHECK_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.description: Email which the alerts are going to be sent..

CHECK_NOTIFICATION_TITLE.description: Title of the email to be sent.

CHECK_NOTIFICATION_INTERVAL.description: How often to check for changes (in minutes)

CHECK_NOTIFICATION_SMSNUMBER.description: SMS Phone number where to notify of changes.
